name: uncollected
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something is uncollected, it has not been collected: piles of uncollected rubbish The US state had at least $600 million in uncollected taxes.
More examplesFewer examplesUncollected prescriptions are a common problem among medical practices. The post office retains uncollected mail for 30 days.Because of the strikes, mounds of rubbish lie uncollected in the streets.The audit found that about half of recent fines remain uncollected. City officials estimate there is at least £2 million in uncollected revenue from parking tickets.

not paid: The company was told it owes $1 million in uncollected sales taxes. Eventually, uncollected bills for the uninsured get paid for by taxpayers or through higher insurance premiums.
